Name: Battle of Okinawa
Text: Capture of the Island Okinawa by American forces

Name: Battle of the Philippine Islands
Text: American and Filipino campaign to defeat and expel Japanes forces in the Philippines.

Name: Battle of Leyte Gulf
Text: Largest naval battle in WW2. Attempt of the United States to isolate Japanese forces from the countries it had occupied in Southeast Asia.

Name: Battle of Iwo Jima
Text: Attempt to capture the Island Iwo Jima to use its airports.
